ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Thirty
ComicInfo.Summary:
SERIES FINALE
“BOUND TO FATE,” Conclusion
Fate burns as the past and present clash in the final battle.
WAYWARD concludes with a special double-sized spectacular that includes an epic 30-page story, pin-ups, and more!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|------------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Steven Cummings & Tamra Bonvillain | 1 | | B | Cover B | Noa Ikeda | Missing |
